attributes.action: Open up GP doctors surgeries for normal appointments.
attributes.additional_details: To scrap the phone appointment to make an appointment system, as it clearly does not work. We as british citizens should be free to walk into our local GP and book an appointment.
attributes.background: The whole nation has been majorly suffering from medical negligence since the beginning of the pandemic. The current system to try and get an appointment at any local GP is completely inhuman. Everyday hundreds of thousands are being disregarded and neglected by GP receptionists. It needs to change.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual surgeries.

We could accept a petition calling for a legal right to face-to-face medical appointments, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
